name: docker config basic ts
description: Auto-generated spike for docker config in ts (basic).

files.template:
FROM node:20-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci
COPY . .
CMD ["npm", "start"]

version: '3.9'
services:
  app:
    build: .
    ports:
      - '3000:3000'
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
